trans-unit.source: Specifies how verbs should be rendered on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的动词上的呈现方式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property determines whether verbs on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a Web Parts zone are rendered in each control's title bar, or in a drop-down verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>属性确定是否上的谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Web 部件区域中的控件呈现在每个控件的标题栏中，或下拉谓词菜单中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartVerbRenderMode enumeration contains values that can be applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property to specify how the verbs should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: WebPartVerbRenderMode 枚举包含值可以应用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>属性指定谓词的呈现方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Verbs are rendered in a shortcut menu in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 谓词呈现在标题栏中的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: Verbs are rendered as links directly in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 谓词呈现为直接在标题栏中的链接。
